title: Split Array Into N Chunks
description: In this lab, we will explore the topic of array manipulation in JavaScript. Specifically, we will focus on the task of splitting an array into smaller chunks of a specified size. Through this lab, you will learn how to use built-in JavaScript methods to efficiently and effectively manipulate arrays. By the end of this lab, you will have gained a deeper understanding of array manipulation in JavaScript and be able to apply these skills to solve real-world problems.
